metadata.title: FTL: The Niko Collection
metadata.author: Vertaalfout, Skye, DemonFusionGamer, Julk, R4V3-0N
metadata.description:
The Niko Collection is a mod with little standardization that seeks to explore various types of fun throughout the multiverse!
If you've ever wanted to:
-Meet a certain familiar feline -Hunt down a flying calculator for loot -Upgrade your crew into their ultimate forms -Have the thickest rocks this side of Node 17 (and beyond) -Shift your crew between specialized forms -Or just set everything on fire
Then look no further, because The Niko Collection offers all of that, and more!
Special thanks to:
-Skye, for sprite work, various ships, and planning -DemonFusionGamer, for coding -Julk, for Niko miniships -R4, for sprite work and various flats -Vertaalfout, for coding and the Svarog -Shifting Walls, for wild ideas and writing -The Ghost Hugger, for encouragement and Python help -All of the Nikos who helped out along the way
For making this all possible!
